recommended_degree: Manajemen Sumber Daya Manusia, Psikologi, Manajemen, Administrasi Bisnis (Sarjana, Diploma)
job_description:
- Assist in planning and executing employee development programs, including training, workshops, and onboarding activities.
- Support the creation of learning materials, presentation decks, and documentation for HR development initiatives.
- Help maintain and update employee training records, attendance, and progress tracking.
- Assist in conducting surveys, gathering feedback, and analyzing data to improve learning and development programs.
- Coordinate schedules, logistics, and communication for training sessions and internal events.
- Collaborate with HR teams to support employee engagement activities and culture-building initiatives.
- Contribute to research on HR best practices, learning trends, and people development strategies.
